December 21, 2024 - KRE-O is a line of construction toys manufactured by South Korea-based Oxford and marketed by Hasbro. Kre-O was released in stores in Fall 2011. The name Kre-O comes from the Latin word creo, which means "I create". Kre-O toys feature highly articulated humanoid figures called "Kreons".
